definition: to wash one's hands/to go to the toilet
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to totally stop doing something/to reform one's ways
lit. to wash one's hands in a gold basin (idiom)/fig. to abandon the life of an outlaw

sentences.english: Hand washing sink should be set at the entrance of biosafety laboratories.
sentences.chinese: 生物安全實驗室洗手池設置在實驗室的入口處。

sentences.english: I was continually getting up and going to the bathroom to refill my glass.
sentences.chinese: 我頻繁起來去洗手間，把我的玻璃杯灌滿水。

sentences.english: One must wash his hands before meals to avoid diseases.
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免病從口入，飯前要洗手。

sentences.english: Wash your hands before and after instilling the drops in your eyes .
sentences.chinese: 點藥前後要洗手，用乾淨的手帕擦眼。

sentences.english: It's a good habit to wash up before a meal.
sentences.chinese: 飯前洗手洗臉是好習慣。

sentences.english: OCD patients feel compelled to repeat behaviours such as washing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 強迫症患者倍感強迫來重複一系列行爲，如重複洗手。

sentences.english: and Moses and Aaron and his sons used it to wash their hands and feet.
sentences.chinese: 摩西和亞倫並亞倫的兒子，在這盆裏洗手洗腳。

sentences.english: She needs to ask for the squad leader’s permission when she wants to go to the washroom.
sentences.chinese: 就連去洗手間，她都需要事先徵得班長的同意。

sentences.english: "We are recommending hand-washing with soap, " Ms Dooley said.
sentences.chinese: “我們建議用肥皂洗手，”Dooley女士說。

sentences.english: Doctors have long advised frequent hand-washing to avoid spreading germs.
sentences.chinese: 醫生長久以來都建議通過勤洗手來減少病毒的傳播。

sentences.english: If your children can't reach the sink on their own, keep a stepstool handy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的孩子自己夠不着洗手盆，就進放一張踏步凳。

sentences.english: Go into the other genda's bathroom without fear of being caught.
sentences.chinese: 進入異性的洗手間，再也不用擔驚受怕了。

sentences.english: And keep hand sanitizer around and use frequently.
sentences.chinese: 四周放些洗手液，經常使用。

sentences.english: Unique seascape toilet attaching to the main bedroom elucidates individual life space.
sentences.chinese: 獨有全海景主臥洗手間，張揚個性生活空間。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 許可證持有人須爲駐工地建築工人提供流動洗手間。

sentences.english: At the same time, you also should wash hands, speak hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 同時你也應該勤洗手，講衛生。

definition: to wash one's hands/(fig.) to go to the toilet
